summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Southeast, from West Andover Street to West Spokane Street et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 23081, creating Local Improvement District No. 2244 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
